channel.title: CVE Feed for WIZVERA -- Veraport
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WIZVERA -- Veraport

item.title: CVE-2018-5199|2024-08-05T05:26:47.105Z -- wizvera -- veraport
item.description: In Veraport G3 ALL on MacOS, due to insufficient domain validation, It is possible to overwrite installation file to malicious file. A remote unauthenticated attacker may use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary file.

item.title: CVE-2018-5198|2024-08-05T05:26:46.990Z -- wizvera -- veraport
item.description: In Veraport G3 ALL on MacOS, a race condition when calling the Veraport API allow remote attacker to cause arbitrary file download and execution. This results in remote code execution.
